rooms.description: Small entry with storage for shoes and outerwear. Locally sourced materials to reduce cost.
Open space designed with Vastu principles, natural light from West-facing windows.
Modern kitchen layout integrated into the living area for a cohesive feel. Includes essential storage and compact appliances.
Spacious room with Vastu-aligned east-west window placement. Built-in closet and ventilation.
Secondary bedroom designed for children or guests, with natural light and ventilation.
Additional bedroom meeting budget constraints with efficient space usage.
Compact but functional living space for domestic help. Includes a small kitchenette and private bathroom.
Cozy reading nook with built-in shelves and Vastu-compliant window placement for natural light.
Additional room for visitors; functional design on a tight budget.
Main bathroom shared with living areas. Designed to be cost-effective.

openings.description: Sturdy front door with glass paneling for natural light, aligned per Vastu guidelines.
Large windows on the west facade to maximize sunlight and comply with Vastu principles of light and energy flow.
Small balcony overlooking the garden for natural ventilation, integrated into the design with minimal cost overheads.

levels.level_description: The ground floor is designed to be functional yet modern, making efficient use of space on a 50x80 feet plot. Budget constraints are addressed through smart space planning and locally sourced materials. Vastu principles guide placement of rooms for optimal energy flow, especially in the west-facing orientation.
